page.title: 10BRIDGE OF WEIR - GAMES 2
page.content: This is how we play a game called{Blue {Murder.}First of all you need two teams{(A}and{B)}with an equal number of players.Then toss a coin to see which team will chase first{(A). Meanwhile the team to be chased{(B) choose any word according to the number of people in the team.For example a team with{6}members needs to find a word with{6}letters and each team member takes a letter.Boundaries of the game must be discussed.Team{B then scatter and team{A}after counting to twenty chase them. As each member of team{B}is caught they are persuaded to tell their letter to team{A.}The correct letter must be revealed so as not to spoil the game.Once team{A}get all of the letters they can rearrange them to discover the word.The teams then change over and the game begins again.
